meanings.definition: Worth a great deal of money.
meanings.sent1: The antique necklace is very valuable.
meanings.sent3: The valuable diamond ring was found in a cereal box.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as valuable as a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The valuable painting sparkled under the lights.

meanings.sent1: His advice was valuable in solving the problem.
meanings.sent2: Time management skills are valuable in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The valuable umbrella kept flying away in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as valuable as a magic potion.
meanings.sent5: The valuable map led them to hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Able to be exchanged for money or goods.
meanings.sent1: The valuable stamp collection was sold at an auction.
meanings.sent2: Diamonds are valuable commodities in the jewelry market.
meanings.sent3: The valuable coupon saved her a lot of money at the store.
meanings.sent4: His words were as valuable as currency in negotiations.
meanings.sent5: The valuable antique vase was traded for a rare book.
